text: Jorge Carlos Berlín Montero (born December 10, 1956) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Yucatán. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Yucatán (state) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Carlos Berlín Montero
